metadata.title: USN-6427-2 -- .NET vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6427-1 fixed a vulnerability in .NET. This update provides the corresponding update for .NET 8.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that the .NET Kestrel web server did not properly handle  HTTP/2 requests. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a  denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6427-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  aspnetcore-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-apphost-pack-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-hostfxr-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 aspnetcore-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-host-8.0 - 8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 No subscription required  dotnet8 - 8.0.100-8.0.0~rc2-0ubuntu1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-8.0 - 8.0.100~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-8.0 - 8.0.100~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-8.0-source-built-artifacts - 8.0.100~rc2-0ubuntu1 dotnet-templates-8.0 - 8.0.100~rc2-0ubuntu1 No subscription required
